The p'i'le of sand was next to the tar bitumen drums.
Do you always gr'i'nd the tiles with care?
Do you always measure the he'igh't of the wall properly?

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the words with the pictures.
පදයන් පින්තූර සමග ගැලපන්න.
சொற்களைப் படங்களுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

example_dialogues.text_a: Do you ride a motorbike on Tuesday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When do you ride a motorbike?
example_dialogues.text_d: I ride a motorbike on Monday.

example_dialogues.text_a: Do you play cricket on Thursday?
Do you and your friend visit elderly relatives on Sunday?
example_dialogues.text_c: When do you visit your elderly relatives?
example_dialogues.text_d: We visit our elderly relatives on Saturday.

dialogues.text_a: Do you use social media on Wednesday?
dialogues.text_c: When do you use social media?
dialogues.text_d: I use social media on Tuesday.

dialogues.text_a: Do you buy groceries on Friday?
Do you spend time with friends on Saturday?
dialogues.text_c: When do you spend time with friends?
dialogues.text_d: I spend time with friends on Friday.

dialogues.text_a: Do you play cricket on Monday?
Do you and your friend play cricket on Friday?
dialogues.text_c: When do you and your friend play cricket?

dialogues.text_a: Do you and your friend spend time together on Thursday?
dialogues.text_c: When do you and your friend spend time together?
dialogues.text_d: We spend time together on Friday.

activity_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

activity_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

content.sentence:
What does a construction foreman do?

A construction foreman supervises workers and checks daily progress on site.

What does a construction foreman do?

He reads blueprints and explains the layout to the masons and carpenters.

What does a construction foreman do?

He plans the next day’s work and assigns tasks to each team.

What does a construction foreman do?

He doesn’t check the scaffold before workers start climbing.

What does a construction foreman do?

He uses measuring tapes, spirit levels, and marking tools during inspection.

What does a construction foreman do?

He does not ignore safety rules or missing helmets on the site.

What does a construction foreman do?

He checks the quality of concrete and ensures it cures properly.

What does a construction foreman do?

He orders materials like sand, cement, and steel rods in advance.

What does a construction foreman do?

He does not record the daily work report or attendance of workers accurately.

What does a construction foreman do?

He coordinates with the site engineer and reports any construction delays.

activity_b.text: A construction foreman supervises workers and checks daily progress on site.
He reads blueprints and explains the layout to the masons and carpenters.
He plans the next day’s work and assigns tasks to each team.
He doesn’t check the scaffold before workers start climbing.
He uses measuring tapes, spirit levels, and marking tools during inspection.
He does not ignore safety rules or missing helmets on the site.
He checks the quality of concrete and ensures it cures properly.
He orders materials like sand, cement, and steel rods in advance.
He does not record the daily work report or attendance of workers accurately.
He coordinates with the site engineer and reports any construction delays.

activity_a.text:
Listen to the recording and match the verbs to the nouns.
රෙකෝඩින් එක සවන් දී ක්‍රියා පදයන් නාම පදයන්ට ගැලපෙන්න.
பதிவைக் கேட்டு வினைகள் மற்றும் பெயர்ச்சொற்களை பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_b.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and match  the correct frequency verb with the collocation/phrase. 
දෙවරක් වාදනය වන ශ්‍රව්‍යයට සවන් දී නිවැරදි සංඛ්‍යාත්මක ක්‍රියා පදය සමඟ එකතු කරන්න.
இருமுறை ஒலிப்பதிவைக் கேட்டு சரியான அடிக்கடி வினையை இணைக்கவும்.

கேளுங்கள்.
සවන් දෙන්න.

கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_c.text: Today, I would like to present the role of an administrative assistant, a position essential to all six sections of our TVET institution.
An administrative assistant usually manages office documentation and maintains accurate student and staff records.
This role often handles correspondence, prepares reports, and supports daily office operations.
The administrative assistant always follows institutional procedures and checks details carefully.
This role does not teach classes and does not supervise workshop activities.
The assistant never discloses confidential information and sometimes uses her judgement in handling difficult situations.
She rarely interacts with students, and hardly ever interacts with academic staff.
Does the administrative assistant work with instructors regularly?
Yes.
Does this role support only one section?
No.
The administrative assistant usually supports all departments and often communicates with external offices.
This position plays a key role to ensure the smooth running of the institution.in smooth institutional management.
I will now outline the role of a caretaker, a position vital for safety and daily operations.
A caretaker usually opens and secures buildings and maintains clean surroundings.
This role often checks utilities, monitors facilities, and ensures safe access for staff and trainees.
The caretaker always follows safety routines and regularly inspects common areas.
This role does not handle office duties and does not repair specialised machines.
The caretaker never leaves premises unsecured after working hours.
Does the caretaker work every day?
Yes.
Does this role work only indoors?
No.
The caretaker often works outdoors and usually completes final security checks before closing.

activity_d.text: An administrative assistant usually manages office documentation and maintains accurate student and staff records.
This role often handles correspondence, prepares reports, and supports daily office operations.
The administrative assistant always follows institutional procedures and checks details carefully.
The assistant never discloses confidential information and sometimes uses her judgement in handling difficult situations.
She rarely interacts with students, and hardly ever interacts with academic staff.
The administrative assistant usually supports all departments and often communicates with external offices.
A caretaker usually opens and secures buildings and maintains clean surroundings.
This role often checks utilities, monitors facilities, and ensures safe access for staff and trainees.
The caretaker always follows safety routines and regularly inspects common areas.
The caretaker never leaves premises unsecured after working hours.
The caretaker often works outdoors and usually completes final security checks before closing.
